name: McMickenHeightsChurch
0:
”Alexa, open Latest Sermon”
”Alexa, ask Latest Sermon for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Latest Sermon”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: latest sermon
des: Listen to the latest sermons from McMicken Heights Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
